detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Some parts are spot-on, others drift a little. Still, you manage to stay mostly aligned with the topic. Your tone feels warm and confident — it’s pleasant to read. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.judgment: A couple of minor grammar slips, but the message still shines through. Laser-focused on the subject; that clarity really strengthens your argument. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat. You manage to stay relevant and optimistic at once — excellent tone.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Grammar is spotless — beautifully written sentences. A few of your statements drift a little, but overall relevance is good.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Grammar needs a bit of fine-tuning, though your ideas come through strongly. Your arguments connect neatly to the topic — keeps things cohesive.
